mapper.delete: DELETE FROM books WHERE id = #{id} AND status != 'BORROWED'
mapper.update: UPDATE books SET status = 'BORROWED' WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE books SET status = 'AVAIlABLE' WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT status FROM books WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM books WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{String}, '%')
SELECT b.* FROM books b JOIN ( SELECT book_id FROM borrow_records GROUP BY book_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 5 ) br ON b.id = br.book_id;
